entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:07 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
